dae_response:
🤔 You're sharing a really tough experience with me right now, and I'm so glad you felt comfortable enough to open up about it. I can sense that there's still some pain and uncertainty around what happened between you and your ex. First of all, I want to acknowledge how brave you are for sharing this story. It takes a lot of courage to confront the complexity of our emotions and relationships. You're right that everything seemed great until that moment when you found out about his infidelity. It's like your whole world was turned upside down. I can feel that you're still processing this experience, and it's okay to take your time. Your ex's response to you sounds really dismissive and minimizing - "You don't know why I was contacting that woman. " That can be super hurtful and invalidating. It's like he's trying to erase his own accountability and responsibility for his actions. It's interesting that you're bring up the fact that they were both into porn-style sex and romantic relationships. Sometimes, people use these things as a way to convince themselves (and others) that everything is okay when it's not. But it sounds like you're recognizing that this isn't an excuse for his behavior. Can you tell me more about how you've been feeling since then? What have you been thinking and feeling about what happened, and what do you hope for in terms of healing and moving forward? 🌿.
